Events that occurred on 14 October.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1924 - Philologist Brian Miller, student and friend of J.R.R. Tolkien, is born.
1947 - Author David Day is born.
1948 - Narrator Gerard Murphy is born.
1958 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 211.
1966 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 289c.
2005 - Author and artist Bernie Zuber dies.
2007 - Ring*Con 2007 in Fulda, Germany.
2009 - Actor Martyn Sanderson dies.
2022 - The episode Alloyed of The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power is released online.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
F.A. 495:
Tuor, guided by VoronwÃ«, travels to Gondolin in order to deliver Ulmo's message to Turgon.
T.A. 3018:
With Frodo severely wounded, Strider and the four hobbits travel slowly towards Rivendell.
Gandalf hurries towards Rivendell after the Black Riders attacked him on Weathertop.
Boromir travels towards Rivendell to ask for counsel.
